I know you have replaced all the childhood memories with the “I am in control” proclamations, but I’m wondering how we can let the kids rejoice in
who they really are.
I have so many slide shows of the real us before this you. I know they would love that.... Any ideas or do we wait for Jennifer to tell us kids deserve to
see childhood memories?!
